title: scpn-quantum-control: Quantum-Native SCPN Phase Dynamics and Control
description: Compiles SCPN Kuramoto coupling matrices into Qiskit circuits and validates them on IBM Heron r2 hardware. Achieves 0.05% VQE ground-state error on 4-qubit XY Hamiltonian. Includes Trotterized UPDE solver (16-layer), QAOA-MPC, quantum Petri nets, quantum spiking neural networks, ZNE/DD error mitigation, and toric-code QEC with MWPM decoder. 442 tests, 99% coverage.
notes: Part of the SCPN (Self-Consistent Phenomenological Network) research framework by ANULUM. Hardware validation performed on IBM Quantum ibm_fez (Heron r2, 156 qubits).
